# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2024-12-20

### Added
- Initial release of Dross framework
- `MedallionPipeline` for orchestrating medallion architecture (bronze/silver/gold)
- `ExperimentTracker` for MLflow integration
- `UCClient` wrapper for Unity Catalog operations
- `BaseModel` ABC and `get_model()` factory for flexible model creation
- `TfidfVectorizer` utility for text feature extraction
- Minimal CLI with config validation and schema documentation
- Comprehensive documentation and examples
